attributes.action: Make a worldwide agreement that if we come across life on another planet, the Americans are banned from being first contact and dooming us all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make a worldwide agreement that if we come across life on another planet, the Americans are banned from being first contact and dooming us all.

You know the above is true. Let a neutral, non-hated and above all TACTFUL nation do it. All agreed??

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
